about_the_game:
Inspired by the top-down helicopter shooters of the '90s, this game aims to be a modern re-imagination of the genre with the same simple and straightforward gameplay.

In Strike Force Damocles you command an attack helicopter to liberate an occupied desert nation. Fight through multiple theaters of operation, each with its set of objectives you can approach in any order you wish. Engage in missions such as strafing convoys, destroying fortifications, search and rescue and more.

  • Plan you sorties to avoid long-range air defenses and manage fuel consumption.

  • Use terrain to avoid detection and enemy fire.

  • Use precision weapons take out high value targets from a distance and close in with rockets and cannon fire.

  • Search and retrieve supplies to keep yourself equipped for further sorties.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains blood and violence against infantry.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 1.8GHz or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Pilot an attack helicopter and complete objectives in open world maps. Use your environment for cover, avoid enemy radars and find the weak spots in your enemy's defenses. Look for hidden supplies to keep yourself armed and fueled. Inspired by '90s top-down helicopter games.
